raw_text:
Embraer Legacy 450/500 and Praetor 500/600 AFCS OPERATION Pro Line Fusion® Avionics Vertical Modes

mode is automatically deselected when selection or capture of another vertical mode occurs.

A green FLCH message is shown in the PFD Flight Mode Annunciation Format when the FLCH mode is active. FLCH is displayed in Magenta while VNAV is active. When in FLCH mode, the AT sets climb thrust for climbs and idle for descents when engaged.
